content:
With the dance studio's location, I can provide you with more detailed information about the route.

To get to the dance studio from your new apartment, you can take the Riverfront Trail northbound for about 10 miles. Once you reach the end of the trail, you'll need to ride on city streets for about 2 miles to reach Oak Street and Maple Avenue.

Here's a suggested route:

1. From your apartment, head north on the Riverfront Trail.
2. Continue on the trail for about 10 miles, passing through several parks and scenic areas.
3. When the trail ends, turn left onto River Road and ride for about 0.5 miles.
4. Turn right onto Oak Street and ride for about 1 mile.
5. Turn left onto Maple Avenue, and the dance studio will be on your right.

The route should take you around 20-25 minutes to complete, depending on your pace. You'll ride on a mix of bike trails, bike lanes, and quiet neighborhood streets.

Some safety notes to keep in mind:

* Be cautious when exiting the Riverfront Trail and merging onto River Road, as there may be traffic.
* Oak Street has a designated bike lane, but be aware of parked cars and pedestrians.
* Maple Avenue is a quieter street, but still be mindful of traffic and pedestrians.

You can use a mapping app like Google Maps or Waze to get turn-by-turn directions and real-time traffic updates. Additionally, consider riding with a bike bell or horn to alert pedestrians and other cyclists of your approach.

With this route, you should be able to enjoy a safe and scenic ride to the dance studio. Have a great time and enjoy your class!
